flawed_nl_solution:
In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=150>>150 trophies.
If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=300>>300 in three years.
Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 300+150 = <<300+150=450>>450 handball trophies in three years.
#### 450

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 150. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
